main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 31 July 1948 in Indianapolis, Indiana by a man and his wife.
interesting points: The object had a lusterless white color and was shaped like a cymbal., It was observed at an altitude of approximately 2000 feet and was travelling at a speed of 1200 MPH., The sighting lasted about 10 seconds., There were no discernible sounds or exhaust trails., The observers reported that the object appeared to shimmer in the sunlight, giving a spinning effect.
sighted object: one object shaped like a cymbal, lusterless white in color
witnesses: Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED], an electrician and a housewife
